func_sig.description: Compute the arcsine of a value in radians.
func_sig.name: compute_arcsin

value.description: The value to compute arcsine for.

func_sig.description: Evaluate tan of arcsine for values within valid domain.
func_sig.name: evaluate_tan_arccos

x.description: The input value for which to evaluate tan(arccos).

func_sig.description: Calculate angles of a triangle given its sides using the cosine rule, returning the angles in degrees.
func_sig.name: calculate_triangle_angles

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression
